column4: No internet connection.....no way to install build-essential... I need MAKE to install b43-fwcutter for my internet connection.. Oh my god why didn't this at least include make
do an apt-get --download-only somewhere with an internet connection, then sneakernet that over to the box you need to sort out.
that's probably what i really needed was how to open .deb files... thanks it worked.. i found a b43-fwcutter .deb
